content.p: Read about creating a targeted version of your CV for each role A well written covering letter will demonstrate your suitability for a role Get advice and understand your rights when applying for jobs with a disability Application forms are challenging and help is at hand to get you off to a great start Find out how to use AI in applications to help you stand out from the crowd Find out about when and how to make speculative applications Take practice tests and explore games-based assessments Find out how to prepare for interviews and use our practice software Explore what happens at an assessment centre plus top tips for group exercises and presentations Learn about commercial awareness and how it can help secure a job telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 3680 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3679 email: careers-team@nottingham.ac.uk
